Key Match Events: Wissa scored a penalty in the 65th minute
Masuaku received a yellow card in the 37th minute
Bayo scored a penalty in the 21st minute
Diawara received a yellow card in the 64th minute
Conte received a yellow card in the 79th minute
Pre-Game Insights: Congo DR have made it to the Africa Cup of Nations quarter-finals without winning a game in regulation time
The Leopards eliminated seven-time winners Egypt in the round of 16
Guinea ended a losing run in the competition's first knockout by defeating Equatorial Guinea
DRC are yet to win a game in Cote d'Ivoire
The Leopards seek their first knockout stage victory since a quarter-final 4-2 win over Congo at the 2015 Cup of Nations
Guinea progressed to the knockout rounds as the competition's best third-placed side
Guinea aim to be productive in the final third to avoid exiting in the quarters
